Parenthood-77.op_claim: I think that people who were "spanked" (i.e. abused) as children, and who are OK with this treatment now, were desensitized to violence and suffer from something like Stockholm syndrome. CMV
Parenthood-77.op_premise: This is the only explanation for why an otherwise rational person would think that beating and hitting a child is the sole exception to the general rule against violence and domestic violence.', 'Stockholm syndrome is when a captive feels sympathy for and defends a captor. Children are like "captives" of their parents and naturally feel love for their parents, whom they are powerless against. This love contradicts the child\'s natural outrage against being physically abused and very often, that outrage is suppressed. The suppression of outrage against violence against oneself desensitizes the individual to violence in general.

reply_contents.content: I was spanked as a kid
elo_info: I was spanked as a kid

reply_contents.content: I really have no intention of making spanking the forefront of discipline since it really doesn't accomplish much, but it does accomplish one thing: it teaches children that getting hit hurts
elo_info: I really have no intention of making spanking the forefront of discipline since it really doesn't accomplish much, but it does accomplish one thing: it teaches children that getting hit hurts

reply_contents.content: Why does this matter
elo_info: Why does this matter

reply_contents.content: Because kids often resolve to hitting as a way to problem-solve
elo_info: Because kids often resolve to hitting as a way to problem-solve

reply_contents.content: I hit my sister all the time when I was younger, because she was a brat
elo_info: I hit my sister all the time when I was younger, because she was a brat

reply_contents.content: My sister went through a bad biting phase
elo_info: My sister went through a bad biting phase

reply_contents.content: Both of these things occurred when we were at an age where you aren't really aware of how other people feel
elo_info: Both of these things occurred when we were at an age where you aren't really aware of how other people feel

reply_contents.content: There's no immediate inclination to put yourself in their shoes
elo_info: There's no immediate inclination to put yourself in their shoes

reply_contents.content: That's just something you grow into and (ideally) gets augmented by how you're raised
elo_info: That's just something you grow into and (ideally) gets augmented by how you're raised

reply_contents.content: So, one time, I hit my sister and my mom spanked me
elo_info: So, one time, I hit my sister and my mom spanked me

reply_contents.content: She asked me if it felt good
elo_info: She asked me if it felt good

reply_contents.content: I said "No," and the light went off on my head as if to say "Holy shi --, is that what I've been doing to people
elo_info: I said “No,” and the light went off on my head as if to say “Holy Shi --, is that what I've been doing to people

elo_info: “ Same with my sister

Use a smart opening quote here: '“'.

reply_contents.content: One day, my mom bit my sister's finger just enough and, after that, my sister stopped biting me
elo_info: One day, my mom bit my sister's finger just enough and, after that, my sister stopped biting me

reply_contents.content: Anyway, even if it's wholly wrong, that still isn't Stockholm Syndrome
elo_info: Anyway, even if it's wholly wrong, that still isn't Stockholm Syndrome

reply_contents.content: There is a cycle in domestic violence and if you include beating in that category then that's really all it is: a cycle
elo_info: There is a cycle in domestic violence and if you include beating in that category then that's really all it is: a cycle

reply_contents.content: There are a lot of abusers out there who know damn well what they're doing is unacceptable, apologize, and then do it again
elo_info: There are a lot of abusers out there who know damn well what they're doing is unacceptable, apologize, and then do it again

reply_contents.content: That's part of the problem, since so many people continuously accept the apology
elo_info: That's part of the problem, since so many people continuously accept the apology

reply_contents.content: This is the only explanation for why an otherwise rational person would think that beating and hitting a child is the sole exception to the general rule against violence and domestic violence
elo_info: This is the only explanation for why an otherwise rational person would think that beating and hitting a child is the sole exception to the general rule against violence and domestic violence

reply_contents.content: Why is this the only explanation
elo_info: Why is this the only explanation

reply_contents.content: Maybe corporal punishment just worked well and they learned positive behaviors more quickly because of it
elo_info: Maybe corporal punishment just worked well and they learned positive behaviors more quickly because of it

reply_contents.content: You're making blanket proclamations without evidence
elo_info: You're making blanket proclamations without evidence

reply_contents.content: Let's ignore for the moment whether or not all corporal punishment is abusive, since you seem to have your mind made up
elo_info: Let's ignore for the moment whether all corporal punishment is abusive, since you seem to have your mind made up

elo_info.message: Perhaps you can shorten this phrase to just 'whether'. It is correct though if you mean 'regardless of whether'.

reply_contents.content: Let's also ignore that physically disciplining a child is not the sole exception to the rule against violence
elo_info: Let's also ignore that physically disciplining a child is not the sole exception to the rule against violence

reply_contents.content: Are you, personally, allowed to discipline another person who is not your (or employee) in any way
elo_info: Are you, personally, allowed to discipline another person who is not your (or employee) in any way

reply_contents.content: Are you allowed to send another person who is not your child to their room
elo_info: Are you allowed to send another person who is not your child to their room

reply_contents.content: Are you allowed to force another person who is not your child to not do what they want within the bounds of the law
elo_info: Are you allowed to force another person who is not your child to not do what they want within the bounds of the law

reply_contents.content: Are you allowed to force another person who is not your child to eat their vegetables
elo_info: Are you allowed to force another person who is not your child to eat their vegetables

reply_contents.content: The answer to all of these, if you aren't a correctional or judicial officer, is no
elo_info: The answer to all of these, if you aren't a correctional or judicial officer, is no

reply_contents.content: Parents having special rights with regards to their children that they do not have with regards to anyone else
elo_info: Parents having special rights with regards to their children that they do not have with regards to anyone else

reply_contents.content: While you may regard the rule against violence to be different from other such rules, it is not the only rule for which parents have the "sole" exception
elo_info: While you may regard the rule against violence to be different from other such rules, it is not the only rule for which parents have the “sole” exception

elo_info.message: Use a smart opening quote here: '“'.
Use a smart closing quote here: '”'.

reply_contents.content: The problem is that you are equating spanking with abuse
elo_info: The problem is that you are equating spanking with abuse

reply_contents.content: Too many people make the mistake of seeing absolutely any form of laying a hand or anything else on a child as equally horrible
elo_info: Too many people make the mistake of seeing absolutely any form of laying a hand or anything else on a child as equally horrible

reply_contents.content: I was spanked as a child
elo_info: I was spanked as a child

reply_contents.content: It was not abuse
elo_info: It was not abuse

reply_contents.content: It did me no harm
elo_info: It did me no harm

reply_contents.content: There was no violence
elo_info: There was no violence

reply_contents.content: Mostly, other methods were used
elo_info: Mostly, other methods were used

reply_contents.content: But occasionally, when I was really really being a little shit, I would get 'a spanking'
elo_info: But occasionally, when I was really being a little shit, I would get 'a spanking'

elo_info.message: Possible typo: you repeated a word

reply_contents.content: Which amounted to a good amount of dread, and a light whap on the bottom from a parent in full control of their own emotions
elo_info: Which amounted to a good amount of dread, and a light what on the bottom from a parent in full control of their own emotions

reply_contents.content: Not near enough to leave a mark, and not near enough to associate parents with 'violence'
elo_info: Not near enough to leave a mark, and not near enough to associate parents with 'violence'

reply_contents.content: When I was old enough to understand reason, this was no longer used
elo_info: When I was old enough to understand reason, this was no longer used

reply_contents.content: Then, when I was a teen, I was hit across the face in anger by my mother
elo_info: Then, when I was a teen, I was hit across the face in anger by my mother

reply_contents.content: This was violence
elo_info: This was violence

reply_contents.content: This was abuse
elo_info: This was abuse

reply_contents.content: Compared to the things some children go through, it was a very mild form of abuse that left no lasting effects (other than loss of respect for my mother), but it was definitely abuse
elo_info: Compared to the things some children go through, it was a very mild form of abuse that left no lasting effects (other than loss of respect for my mother), but it was definitely abuse

reply_contents.content: Instead of a carefully controlled and calm method of discipline, this was a parent lashing out instinctively with violence in response to getting angry and failing to control it
elo_info: Instead of a carefully controlled and calm method of discipline, this was a parent lashing out instinctively with violence in response to getting angry and failing to control it

reply_contents.content: Having experienced both, there is a very solid difference between spanking as discipline and beating or abusing a child
elo_info: Having experienced both, there is a very solid difference between spanking as discipline and beating or abusing a child

reply_contents.content: What about people who don't like their parents and advocate spanking
elo_info: What about people who don't like their parents and advocate spanking
